name: Eskalerra
description:
You are an explorer who just found the legendary tresure of Eskalera in the end of an apparently endless cave. Oh no! the cave is collapsing! You must get out of the cave before some rock crushes you. But be carefull with the holes!

How to play:

  • Use the mouse to lead the character to the stairs.
  • Avoid the holes

This game was done in aproximately 12 hours by @Nekuake and me.

Art was made by us, music, sfx and font, was not.
